short_summary: This project deal with storage, distribution and shipping of IT equipment with additional service requirements.
description: This RFI is being issued by SSC. It is intended that the contract resulting from any subsequent solicitation would be used by SSC to provide shared services to one or more of its clients. SSC’s clients include SSC itself, those government institutions for which SSC’s services are mandatory at any point during the life of any resulting instrument(s), and those other organizations for which SSC’s services are optional at any point during the life of any resulting instrument(s) and that choose to use those services from time to time.
full_summary:
**Warehousing Services**

* **Tender ID**: cb-8313-42299710
* **Solicitation Number**: R000082647
* **Publication Date**: August 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 15, 2023, 14:00:00 (EDT)

## Overview
The Government of Canada is soliciting warehousing services for Shared Services Canada (SSC). The services include storing, tagging, distributing, and shipping government-owned IT equipment and related goods.

## Scope of Work
SSC estimates that it will require up to 2000 pallets of IT equipment for pre-deployment storage at any given time. The successful bidder will be required to provide dedicated warehouse spaces in Canada to accommodate this inventory.

## Procurement Details
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

## Contract Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Contact Person**: Krys Pikula
* **Email**: [Krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (613) 668-2207

## Tender Documents
Tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). 

## Language of Tender Documents
The tender documents and any subsequent related documents will be published in English and French.

**Important Dates**
*   Tender Closing Date: September 15, 2023, 14:00:00 (EDT)
*   Planned Contract Start Date: Upon completion of the procurement process
*   Planned Contract End Date: Upon completion of the procurement process

The Government of Canada reserves the right to terminate or modify the procurement process at any time.

Note: This tender enclosure is for information purposes only. A formal Request for Proposal (RFP) or Request for Tender (RFT) will be issued separately and will supersede the information provided in this enclosure. 

Renewed Description Appel of Offres:
La présente DDR est publiée par SPC. SPC prévoit utiliser le ou le contrat obtenus à la suite d ‘une demande de soumission subséquente pour fournir des services partagés
